help-file.title: "INCENDIARY CLOUD"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Fire
The incendiary cloud is a white-hot mass of flaming gasses, which swirl forth from the ether to envelop all those not in the caster's party. This spell is among a Sorcerer's most powerful, and can cause devastating amounts of damage to those affected by it.
